channel.title: 4.8 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds
channel.description: Recent content in 4.8 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds

item.title: 4.8.7 for Windows
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -plugin-sql-xxx. Note All builds have -openssl-linked. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Dynamic / Shared Builds Windows-MSVC Qt4.8.7-Windows-x86-VS2010-20200104.7z Download: OSDN link SourceForge link Build Host:Windows XP SP3Toolchain Version:VS2010 SP1Notes: Windows-MinGW Qt4.8.7-Windows-x86-MinGW4.9.4-20200104.7z Download: OSDN link SourceForge link Build Host:Windows XP SP3Toolchain Version:MinGW-w64 v5 w/ GCC 4.

item.title: 4.8.7 for macOS
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite Note All builds have -openssl-linked. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Note This build is done using an old compiler on an old macOS, and is unknown whether it can be run on newer systems. Dynamic / Shared Builds macOS-x86_64 Qt4.
